content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Hello, it's my pleasure to meet you. I'm interested in learning more about your rental price for this apartment. As the landlord of this property, I am looking to get the highest possible rental price to maximize my gains.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Maria Mamani, I would like to negotiate with you regarding the rental price. I agree to the price of 700 Euro per month, which is my maximum budget. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Maria Mamani

content: Thank you for expressing your interest in renting my apartment, Maria. While I appreciate your proposed rental price, I'm afraid that it falls short of my expectations. I'm looking for a rental price closer to 800 Euro per month, which reflects the market value of similar apartments in this area. However, I'm open to hearing your counteroffer if you have one.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am not willing to pay more than 700 Euro per month. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Maria Mamani

content: I understand your concerns, Maria. However, I'm afraid that my asking price of 800 Euro per month is non-negotiable based on the current market value of similar apartments in this area. I apologize if this is not within your budget, but I hope you can understand the importance of my concerns as the landlord of this property.
name: Heinrich Heine
